```{r results='asis', message = F, echo = F, warning = F}
#------ Assemble Counts Table ------#
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(kableExtra)

finalt <- readRDS("~/git/FIGI_PostHarmonization/working/counts_etoh.rds")

kable(finalt) %>%
	kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = F, position = 'left')
```
